item.description:
7/19/2010 - June 19 & 20 - 2010 Festival on the Farm Festival on the Farm

(formerly... A Taste of The Litchfield Hills).

A Wine, Dine & Music event.

This is the Vineyard's 25th year hosting this historic festival. We plan to make this years festival bigger and better than ever. We are focusing on local, organic and unique produce and services. We welcome you to CT's first established farm winery for music, wine, food and fun.

There will be crafters, vendors and food from throughout New England represented at this year's festival.

Hours are: Saturday 11-8pm, Sunday 11-5pm.

Admission is $8 which covers parking, entrance, live music, cellar and vineyard tours.

or.. $15 entitles you to general admission, plus our souvenier HBV wine-glass and full walk around wine tasting.

For questions, please contact HB at 860-567-4045

Vendors and exhibitors contact Tina A Torizzo at 860-307-5426
